issue.message: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to query or interact with MediaStore or media files on the shared storage, you should instead use one or more new storage permissions: `READ_MEDIA_IMAGES`, `READ_MEDIA_VIDEO` or `READ_MEDIA_AUDIO`.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to write to shared storage, use the `MediaStore.createWriteRequest` intent.
The id `R.id.header_field_container` has already been looked up in this method; possible cut & paste error?
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Field requires API level 33 (current min is 23): `android.Manifest.permission#READ_MEDIA_IMAGES`
Do not modify the set returned by `SharedPreferences.getStringSet()``
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.
Accessing internal APIs via reflection is not supported and may not work on all devices or in the future
Attribute `resizeableActivity` is only used in API level 24 and higher (current min is 23)
Replace the <fragment> tag with FragmentContainerView.
